sqlMap.statement: create table if not exists $tableName$ ( id int(11) not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, log_type int(11) not null default -100, log_time bigint not null, region_id int(11) , server_id int(11) , account_id varchar(128), account_name varchar(128), char_id bigint not null, char_name varchar(128), level int(11) , country_id int(11) , vip_level int(11) , total_charge int(11) , device_id varchar(256), device_type varchar(256), device_version varchar(256), client_version varchar(256), client_language varchar(256), appid varchar(256), f_value varchar(256), reason int(11) , param text , good_activity_id bigint , tpl_id int(11) , reward_id int(11) , target_id int(11) , createTime bigint not null ,key account_id (account_id) ,key account_name (account_name) ,key char_id (char_id) ,key char_name (char_name) )ENGINE = MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8
